ygData.subject: The alarm has rung...
ygData.msgSnippet: On a distant world, maybe not even in the same universe, a ray of energy arrives in an installation. The beings there notice the signal and go to analyze it.

Subject: The alarm has rung...

On a distant world, maybe not even in the same universe, a ray of 
energy arrives in an installation. The beings there notice the signal 
and go to analyze it.

Batuk: VECTOR EARTH?!? HOW CAN ANYONE OF THEIR KIND DARE TO TOUCH THAT 
SOIL AGAIN?

Rekis: Calm down. They must be a new crew this time. The one who 
touched the sphere has never been encountered before. However, we must 
act to preserve the vector from more damages.

Batuk: Maybe so, but our last intervention brought no difference in 
their conflict.

Rekis: Unit Tigerhawk has been destroyed by the Nemesis, but the 
warship has been sunk for a long time. We have analyzed them and we 
know how to generate more of their kind. What I suggest is that we 
send a unit to the vector's satellite and that we activate it if 
another sphere is discovered.

Batuk: We must make it powerful and devoid of what they call their 
"spark". This is the reason we lost Unit Tigerhawk. I will give it a 
soul of it's own.

Rekis generated a design and Batuk generated its soul.

Rekis: Rise, Meteara, go on Moon and wait for their next disturbance 
to go down on Vector Earth and righten our plans!

The female robot stood (as much as she could in this vaporous world), 
activated her thrusters and flew off.

Meteara: Yes masters! I will rid the Vector of the Cybertronian 
presence!
